Recently, a guy friend of mine said that airsoft isn't for girls because it goes against Biblical principals. What do you think?
 
 (If you don't believe in the Bible, please don't participate in this discussion.)

Well I'm glad to see that 4forums users are finally getting down to discussing important issues.
 
 But seriously... shouldn't this be in the fun debates or something?

I agree that it should be in the fun debtes... kinda
 
 
 Well, I think anyone can play it. I play it with girls all the time.
 
 I highly doubt "Girls cant play AirSoft" is agianst the bible.. your freind is weird... ask him where he heard that from...

Well, I think anyone can play it. I play it with girls all the time.

 
 I don't know about this. I shot my wife with an airsoft gun one time and she was more than a little miffed. It left a welt.

What the heck is airsoft?
 
 Waxy

Airsoft is this game where you shoot little plastic pellets at each other. (They're about half the size of a pea.)
 
 No, this isn't meant to be a "funny" debate. I'm serious. This guy honestly doesn't think girls should play airsoft. 
 
 I don't see where he got that in the Bible... but he was pretty mad at me when I asked if I could play it with him and some of his friends.
 
 I was just curious to see if I was the only one who thought this was weird...
 
 Guess not! :)

Guys, I think you're all forgetting your Leviticus here:
 
 
And the LORD spaketh unto Moses, saying,
 
 Thou shalt not approach unto a woman to partake in the soft of air, for yay thou shall verily be stoned to death;
 
 Moreover thou shalt not shoot little pellets with womankind, as with mankind: it is an abomination.
 
 So spaketh the LORD.

o.O I suppose he could be referring to how the Bible kind of... er... "promotes" (for lack of a better word) male dominancy. Read: woman get to cook all day.
 
 Wow. I'm still kind of... miffed. emoticon_wow
